chunks.title: Due Date Calculation +5 days
chunks.text: Payment term is 5 natural days after cycle close (DOM=1).

chunks.title: First Bill (BillNow)
chunks.text: Activation triggers BillNow and updates STATUS_FAC.

chunks.title: Trial Billing
chunks.text: Trial invoices are created only in open cycles as /invoice/trial.

chunks.title: Credit Note for Proration
chunks.text: Negative items are netted by opposite adjustments; credit note is prepared.

chunks.title: Global Sequences
chunks.text: Single global, non-reusable invoice numbering via /data_sequence.
